channel.title: Crash to windows when fighting the helicopter
channel.description: Crash in bm_c2a5c when fighting the helicopter, to be more precise when it's on fire and start to lauch massive ammount of missiles mdmp in attatch hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_22T10_21_56C0.mdmp (84.3 KB)

item.description:

item.title: Crash to windows when fighting the helicopter
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Yep, I have to second Leijonasisu on this. Had a lot of crashes during both helicopter fights, mostly related to TAU cannon usage, but in the end had managed to slip through these parts of the game and went on up to the Xen portal.

Read full topic
item.source: Crash to windows when fighting the helicopter

item.title: Crash to windows when fighting the helicopter
item.dc:creator: SonicAngel
item.description:
Tau cannon being the rocket launcher? Cause I been going nuts with crashes in that place cause the game keeps crashing but I think it crashes when I die as well, not just the chopper…

I got through it anyways, using all my laser ammo and my MP5 rocket launcher eventually. Real damage to my ammunition…

Read full topic
item.source: Crash to windows when fighting the helicopter

item.title: Crash to windows when fighting the helicopter
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
You’re gonna have fun trying not to use it though… depending on what helicopter you’re talking about. If its the one with the missile launcher, use that. If it’s not, and its the one before that, then you’re gonna have a real hard time trying to get it to go away… If you’re gonna use the TAU cannon make sure that you don’t ‘kill it’ with it. It seems to be okay damaging it, but killing it with it, makes the game crash for many people.

Read full topic
item.source: Crash to windows when fighting the helicopter

item.title: Crash to windows when fighting the helicopter
item.dc:creator: The_Laughing_Man
item.description:
Leijonasisu:

Happened to all of us… don’t use the TAU cannon. It creates problems with the shots reflecting off the helicopter.

ooh so that’s what it was… thanks a lot

Read full topic
